title: Culturalba
description: Application that get the information of the cultural events from the webiste of the Albacete's townhall and shows them in an Android device.

title: deCañas
description:
Android application that shows over a map the nearest "caña and tapa" places. The user can check all the information about them and interact with other users adding images of the food, drinks or decoration.

This project was used as final project for the Master in Web Technologies and it got a 9 over 10. Currently new functionalities are being added and it will be available in the Play Store soon.

title: CMMI Helper para Android
description: CMMI Helper is an application developed and designed to help in the evaluation of the software quality model CMMI in companies or in a didactic use. This tool allows the user to manage the organizations that will be studied storing relevant information about them, and create one or more evaluations based in the standard CMMI-DEV v1.3.
